name: Okpa
description:
Do you want to enjoy the experience of eating a yummy Nigerian delicacy?

Then this game is for you.

"Okpa" is a delicious delicacy that is indigenous to South-Eastern Nigeria. You need to taste it. It's so YUMMY!

Will you like to enjoy a virtual experience of eating this delicacy? Then start playing!

  • Get rewarded for feeding a hungry game character named Ugo
  • Use your earned cowries to buy game boosters
  • Prevent your delicious okpa from wasting in the stream
  • Avoid letting your okpa hit any obstacle as it will be wasted

Shoot the slingshot, dodge the obstacles, and you will find yourself saying YUMMY! YUMMY!! YUMMY!!!
